full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Notice Title**
---------------

Laundry Services for Department of National Defence

**Solicitation Number**
----------------------

Event Identifier: WS3964417784; Amendment Number: 1

**Opening Date**
----------------

Publication Date: 3 May 2023

**Closing Date and Time**
-------------------------

Appel Offres Date Clôture: 20 June 2023 14:00:00 EDT

**Notice Type**
---------------

Request for Standing Offer

**Description**
---------------

A Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) is required to provide regular laundry services, including pick-up and delivery of items, to the Department of National Defence (DND) Garrison Wainwright, located in Denwood, Alberta. The required services will be performed during the period of the Standing Offer.

**Scope**
---------

The scope of the request includes:
- Regular laundry services, including pick-up and delivery of items, to DND Garrison Wainwright
- Services will be performed as required during the period of the Standing Offer

**Trade Agreements and Commodity**
--------------------------------

This opportunity is open to all Canadian businesses and foreign entities who have registered with the relevant authorities.

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

Delivery is restricted to the province of Alberta.

**Goods and Services Subject to Offer**
---------------------------------------

* UNSPSC Code: 91111500
* UNSPSC Description: Laundering services

**Buyer Information**
-------------------

* Minister of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Person: Tanya Gostev
* Contact Phone: None
* Contact Email: [tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
--------------

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16165526?extsite=MTYxNjU1MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information, please contact Tanya Gostev at [tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or refer to the notice URL above.

**Tender Closing Information**
---------------------------

* Please disregard the original closing time listed in the Ariba Discovery posting response and CanadaBuys.
* All bid submissions must be received
